name: @MyByteAblaze
comment: Wonderful job on Apartment 213, love the art and the UX! #GGJ2014

name: J
comment: Apartment 213 was fun. I'm still not sure what I was trying to get the cat to do. Was he/she leading the owl to do dishes? Regardless, I laughed several times during the game. I liked the background scenery and changes made on each level. I may have to hang an egg and bacon picture on my living room wall. â€” I figured out what the cat is supposed to do. I won't spoil it for anyone who hasn't played. The whole thing has me cracking up.
